Transcription for 1724596

So when you first kind of got together,
was your mother involved in at that stage as well?
It was quite funny because at the same,
the point where my mother wanted to get involved,
her mother got involved as well.
So it was hysterical because the mothers used to come with us
but we used to be in one corner of the cinema
and there used to be like totally the other end
and they used to absolutely crack me up.
So what age were you at this?
Oh, I must have been about 13, 14, I think, possibly.
